title: She's Always Right
lyrics:
She, said everything is fine
Shes leaving you behind
You had your chance to apologise
There's no one on your side
Nowhere left to hide

And shes always right

Gonna feel the fight

Gonna fell you heart break

Never win the fight



Cause I don't wanna be the one to explain

That maybe, well you saved it

But shes always right



She a privy in the morning with her coffee and her dog

Shes gotta long list of reasons why she'll tear out your heart

There's no one on your side

There's nowhere left to hide

Save me



And shes always right

Gonna feel the fight

Gonna fell you heart break

Never win the fight



Cause I don't wanna be the one to explain

That maybe, well you saved it

But shes always right

Cause I don't wanna be the one to explain

That maybe, that you saved it

But shes always right



She a privy in the morning with her coffee and her dog

Shes gotta long list of reasons why she'll tear out your heart

There's no one on your side

There's nowhere left to hide

Save me

And shes always right

And shes always right

Save me, save me
